name: Beyond the Veil: A Kitty Cat Mystery Adventure
name_original: Beyond the Veil: A Kitty Cat Mystery Adventure
description:
Beyond the Veil: A Kitty Cat Mystery Adventure is a 2D puzzle platformer where you and your trusty assistant switch between charming detective and adorable kitty cat to solve the case of your missing coworker. 

As you collect clues and put your expert sleuthing to the test, you'll find yourself getting closer to unveiling  the truth of your investigation (and to your partner). 

With over six different endings, this game is perfect for players who enjoy mystery and detective-themed entertainment infused with elements of romance and choice-driven narrative. 

Made in collaboration between USC Games and Berklee College of Music.
